summary: Full-stack responsive web application "EduBridge – Global Student Help & Freelancing Platform" connecting students, helpers/freelancers, and businesses with role-based authentication, help request flows (online/offline), dashboards, chat, ratings, search/filtering, notifications, deployment-ready build, and an upgraded premium SaaS-level UI featuring glassmorphism, blue–purple–cyan gradients, modern typography, dark/light mode, and lightweight micro-animations across all pages.
architectural_notes: Role-based access control with roles: Student, Helper/Freelancer, Business, Admin.
Requests support Online vs Offline; Offline requires additional location fields (location/city/address).
Core data entities: Users, Requests, Tasks, Ratings, Messages.

Visual design direction updated to premium SaaS UI using glassmorphism (blurred cards) and a blue–purple–cyan gradient palette, with lightweight micro-animations and strong accessibility contrast in both light/dark modes.

existing_features.title: Create the core information architecture and routing for EduBridge with the following pages/screens: Landing, Login, Create Account, Student Request Help, Freelancing & Service Help, Student Dashboard, Helper Dashboard, Admin Dashboard, and a Not Found page.

Implement a cohesive modern professional visual theme across the app with a distinct gradient-based style (not blue/purple by default), consistent typography, spacing, and components; include smooth micro-interactions and maintain visual parity in both Light and Dark modes.

Build the Landing Page with: an animated hero banner featuring typing text exactly "Helping Students • Completing Projects • Supporting Businesses"; primary CTAs for Login, Create Account, and Request Help; a section highlighting Students Help, Freelancing Services, and Business Support; scroll animations and hover effects.
Implement email/password authentication with role selection and account creation, including the specified fields and validations, and connect it to backend authentication APIs.
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) in the backend and frontend route-guards so that Student, Helper/Freelancer, Business, and Admin capabilities are separated and protected.

Create the Student Request Help page and its submission flow with the exact form fields specified, including manual text description boxes for Subject and Topic, a large help description textarea, an Online/Offline selection, and conditional offline address fields (Location, City, Address). Do not include any file upload anywhere.

Create the Freelancing & Service Help page without category cards; instead provide a Help Request section where users enter a title and a large description, then submit the help request to the backend.

Implement the Student Dashboard to display the current student's submitted requests with statuses (Pending / Accepted / Completed) and provide entry points to chat with the assigned helper where applicable.

Implement the Helper Dashboard to list available help requests, allow accepting tasks, allow marking/submitting completed work, and include a rating system where students can rate helpers after completion.
Implement the Admin Dashboard with user management, request management, and analytics charts using backend-provided aggregated metrics.

Implement live chat messaging between students and helpers for a request/task using polling (no WebSockets) with message threads stored in the backend; include basic unread/notification indicators in the UI.
Add search and filtering for requests, including location-based filtering for offline help requests.
Ensure SEO-friendly structure for the SPA by adding appropriate document titles, meta descriptions where feasible, and semantic markup on the landing page and key public routes.

Provide a deployment-ready build for the Internet Computer project with clear hosting/deployment instructions (dfx build/deploy steps, environment configuration if any) and how to obtain the live canister URLs after deployment.
Enforce the "no file upload options anywhere" requirement across the entire UI and backend by not implementing any file upload inputs/endpoints.

Generate and include a small set of custom static marketing images (logo + landing hero illustration) and render them in the frontend as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated (not served via backend).

Update the global visual design system to a premium SaaS style using glassmorphism (blurred translucent surfaces), smooth blue–purple–cyan gradients, softer shadows, and more-rounded component shapes across all pages while keeping all user-facing text in English.

Implement reusable non-UI-folder wrapper components/utilities for the premium styling (e.g., glass cards/containers, glass inputs, and glow/gradient buttons) and refactor existing pages to use them without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

Upgrade the Landing Page to a full-screen premium hero section that includes (1) animated typing headline behavior, (2) floating animated background shapes, (3) hover glow effects on buttons, and (4) scroll-reveal animations for each major section, matching the new blue–purple–cyan theme.

Modernize all authentication and request forms (Login, Create Account/Signup, Student Request Help, Freelancing Help) to use rounded glass-style inputs with focus glow, premium spacing, and mobile-first responsiveness improvements.

Upgrade dashboards (Student, Helper, Admin) with a modern sidebar navigation that includes icons, provides role-appropriate navigation links, and remains responsive (collapsible/drawer behavior on mobile).
Add animated statistics cards and gradient section headers to dashboard pages, using lightweight animations and the blue–purple–cyan gradient theme.
Add smooth transitions between pages and key UI state changes (tabs, dialogs, section reveals) while keeping animations lightweight and respecting reduced-motion preferences.

Implement micro-animations across the UI: subtle hover-scale on cards, improved loading animations for request-heavy views, and an animated success confirmation after form submission (e.g., RequestSuccessBanner).

Ensure performance and accessibility quality for the new UI: animations remain smooth on mobile, layouts are responsive at common breakpoints, and dark/light mode maintains accessible contrast; include a premium toggle switch control in the header for theme switching with a smooth theme transition.

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with modern UI, gradient theme, smooth/scroll animations, hover effects, and animated hero typing text
Dark mode / Light mode toggle across the site
Authentication system: login (email/password + role selection) and create account (name/age/email/password/country + role radio buttons)
Student Request Help page with required form fields, subject/topic as text description boxes, online/offline selection with conditional offline address fields, and submit (no file uploads)
Freelancing & Service Help page as a help request section (title + large description + submit), with category cards removed
Student dashboard: view submitted requests, statuses (Pending/Accepted/Completed), and chat with helper
Helper dashboard: view available requests, accept tasks, submit completed work, and student rating system
Admin dashboard: manage users/requests and view analytics charts
Backend API with secure authentication, password encryption, and role-based access control
Database models for Users, Requests, Tasks, Ratings, and Messages
Live chat messaging system between student and helper
Notification alerts system
Search and filter requests, including location-based filtering for offline help
Rating and review system
SEO-friendly structure
Deployment-ready build with hosting instructions and a live preview link
Implement backend data models and persistence for Users, Requests, Tasks, Ratings, and Messages, and expose a complete set of backend APIs needed by the frontend flows.
Upgrade global UI to premium SaaS look: glassmorphism cards (blur), blue–purple–cyan gradient theme, soft shadows/rounded components, and modern professional fonts
Landing page premium animation pass: full-screen animated hero, headline typing animation, floating animated background shapes, button hover glow, and scroll-reveal section animations
Modernize forms (Login/Signup/Request Help): rounded glass inputs, focus-glow while typing, improved mobile spacing, and smooth button hover animations
Dashboard UI upgrade: modern icon sidebar navigation, animated statistics cards, gradient section headers, and smooth page-to-page transitions
Micro-animations + UX feedback: subtle hover-scale on cards, loading animations for requests, and success confirmation animation after form submission (keep lightweight/performance-friendly)
